events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses following a recent surgery.
Loan application was categorised under Personal Loan due to keywords such as 'medical' and 'personal expense'.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans has been assigned to handle this case promptly.
The loan officer conducted an initial review focusing on the applicant's medical expense documentation and overall application completeness.
Additional documents, including recent medical bills and identity verification, were requested to proceed with the risk assessment.
Applicant submitted all requested documents promptly, including medical bills, proof of income, and photo ID.
A credit check was performed revealing a favorable credit score supportive of loan approval for personal purposes.
Risk assessment concluded with a low-risk profile, reflecting reliable repayment capacity despite recent medical expenses.
Loan offer was presented to the applicant detailing principal amount, interest rate, and repayment schedule tailored to medical financial needs.
Applicant gave positive feedback expressing satisfaction with offer terms and readiness to proceed with acceptance.
The loan was officially approved by the credit committee following confirmation of all required conditions.
Loan funds were successfully disbursed to the applicant's bank account to cover medical bills and related expenses.
Scheduled follow-up call to ensure applicant's satisfaction and offer assistance with repayment planning.
The loan application case was officially closed after successful funding and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
